E

execute(HttpServletRequest) - Method in interface com.devproserv.courses.command.Command
Takes a command from user form (sent in HTTP request) and defines the page which is returned as response by the servlet.
execute(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class com.devproserv.courses.command.CourseSelectCommand
Retrieves the number of the selected course, checks if the choice is valid, makes changes in the database and returns the same page but with changed tables
execute(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class com.devproserv.courses.command.LoginCommand
Defines if the name and password of the user exists in the database and if yes, returns the page for the user.
execute(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class com.devproserv.courses.command.LogoutCommand
Invalidates the session for the current user.
execute(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class com.devproserv.courses.command.RegistrationCommand
Gets data about the new user from the HTTP request, creates an instance of the User, writes the fields of the object and sends it to the DB via UserDao.
